about_the_game: Supercharge your route to glory by grabbing the GRID Legends Mechanic Pass. This item reduces the distance required to access the different levels of performance upgrades available for a vehicle, meaning the Mechanic Pass allows players to unlock each vehicles’ full potential quicker.
detailed_description: Supercharge your route to glory by grabbing the GRID Legends Mechanic Pass.
